page.title: 08RECREATION - DARTFORD PARKS
page.content: Central park is very big and it has two playgrounds.One of them is quite old and has a lot of swings in it. The newer playground is a lot bigger and better. It has two lots of swings a helter-skelter, and a bus which is a climbing frame with a slide. Nearby, where there used to be some trees, just the trunks remain for children to climb on. I think the best thing is the big climbing frame with slides, bridges, ropes and a house on the end of it. There are a lot of flowers in laid out gardens in central park,making it very attractive, and generally the park is kept tidy. Heskith Park is a lot smaller and the playground in it is similar to the one in Central Park. There are four grass tennis courts,and two tarmac. In the park is a Kent County Cricket ground.
